short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add an input before every <select> list to filter <option>

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Select filter adds a textbox aside every selectbox field in the page, allowing to search the select list by displaying only options that match the search term.

This is a useful tool when you have to fill forms with very very long lists and don't want to look for the option you want to choose.

It can be easily enabled/disabled by clicking the icon (toggle switch).
